title: Yuan Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Japanese, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Taiwanese
description: Modern, upscale vegetarian buffet and salad bar at 新北市板橋區府中路29之2號4樓. Offers a variety of Taiwanese, Chinese, as well western dishes. Labels dishes that contain dairy and egg. Large interior with view overlooking the street below. Bargain dining time is at afternoon tea time from 2:30-4:30pm with reservation required.
